TitleTekion lawsuit claims CDK controls dealership data to prevent competition
Dealership management upstart Tekion is suing market leader CDK Global, alleging the company uses anticompetitive practices to sway franchised dealerships from choosing another DMS provider. It is seeking damages and earlier access to data during product testing or switchovers.
